channel.title: Post Your Request
channel.description:
Hey everyone. It is Dudeofthed and he wants you to do something, he wants you to request a script.
Please post your script request here and i will make/answer your requests with good, working, reliable ones. This is so the request forum doesn't get too crowded with threads.
Cheers, Dudeofthed.

item.title: Post Your Request
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

ikick221:

auto fisher?s

Yea, i can make them. They’ll be easy

@sweetReaper
Here is your script, it will only refresh. If you want anything else added then just ask (Just Copy and Paste it into SCAR). [code]////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// //
// Dudeofthed Presents: //
// A Gaiaonline refrsher //
// for sweetReaper. //
// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
{
Instructions:
1. Just press run when you’re on the web browser.
2. Let it keep refreshing.
3. To cancel press F9
4. If you have found a good item, press F9 then
click on “STOP” in your web browser.
}

program GaiaRefresher;

begin
repeat
KeyDown(116);
Wait(1000) //Reset time depending on your internet speed.
//Default is 1000 miliseconds a.k.a 1 second.
Until(IsFKeyDown(9))
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Post Your Request
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“wazup, post:9, topic:82317”]i need a autominer or power miner woteva thy calld wot will go into the mining guild and mine a full inventory of coal and then take to bank and go back ect… also i want to find one so if soemone goes hi or hey or yo you say hi back so u cant get reported really, also so if a monster attacks you run nort, and one what kind of gets round random events… really need a free one if possible atm i using guild miner 1.3 wot ok but it int got the hi thing

hope dis makes sence cheers[/quote]
@robbee
I will make you a Gaionline page refresher. It will be ready very soon.

@sweetReaper
I am sorry, but that is to advanced for me and probably is to anyone.

@wazup
Those scripts are too advanced. But you could buy sumilions one for 950k, or Mad Cows for 1000k. They’re both pretty much the same but i’d go with Sumilions.

Read full topic

item.title: Post Your Request
item.dc:creator: @sweetReaper sweetReaper
item.description:
@sweetReaper wrote:

I was wondering if you could possibly make some scripts for www.gaiaonline.com. Auto-refreshers and such would be very helpful at this site, as refreshing the pagecan earn you gold for your account. Scripts for the games would also be spiffy =P…Just wondering

                              ^^ have a nice day ^^
